headline: Citi raises first-quarter average tin price forecast, sees easing in second quarter
summary: Citi Research raised its average tin price forecast for the first quarter of 2025 to $32,000 per metric ton from $29,000 on Friday but noted that prices will start easing from the second quarter. ...

headline: Citigroup mistakenly credits customer account with $81 trillion in "near miss", FT reports
summary: Citigroup erroneously credited$81 trillion, instead of $280, to a customer's account and tookhours to reverse the transaction, a near miss that shows upthe bank's operational issues it has sought...
